note.p: Surgeon. In the Bengal Medical Service. At Moradabad. MRCS 1828. Assistant surgeon, 1829; postmaster at Moradabad, 1840; surgeon, 1846; retired, 1853. A friend of William Henry Benson. Died in Exeter.
Asiastic Journal and Monthly Miscellany n.s 31 (1840): 381
Correspondence vol. 5, letter from W. H. Benson, 5 December 1855
